settings.privacy_settings_desc: Control who can view your profile
settings.about_description: ScoutMena is a youth-focused football talent platform built to unlock untapped talent with real opportunity across the MENA region. Connecting players aged 9–18 of both genders with coaches, scouts, and clubs, the platform bridges the gap between grassroots talent and professional pathways. Players can build digital profiles, upload highlight videos, and gain verified endorsements, while scouts and clubs’ benefit from a streamlined, data-driven pipeline that makes discovery more inclusive and efficient. With tailored journeys for three age groups that ensure relevance and safety, a bilingual interface, and mobile-first design, ScoutMena is positioned to become the region’s first digital pipeline for youth football discovery and development.
settings.logout_message: Are you sure you want to logout?
settings.logout_error: Failed to logout. Please try again.
settings.logged_out: You have been logged out successfully
settings.web_view_coming_soon: This will open in a web view soon
settings.contact_subtitle: We're here to help! Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.
settings.feedback_subtitle: Your feedback helps us improve. Let us know what you think!
settings.subject: Subject
settings.message_hint: Please provide as much detail as possible...
settings.message_too_short: Message must be at least 10 characters
settings.message_sent_success: Message sent successfully! We'll get back to you soon.
settings.message_sent_error: Failed to send message. Please try again.
settings.response_time_info: We typically respond within 24-48 hours during business days.
settings.faq_account_creation: How do I create an account?
settings.faq_account_creation_answer: Download the ScoutMena app, tap 'Sign Up', and follow the registration process. You'll need to verify your phone number or email address. If you're under 16, parental consent will be required.
settings.faq_profile_visibility_answer: You control your profile visibility in privacy settings. Players can choose between public (everyone), scouts only (verified scouts), or private. For users under 16, profiles are restricted to verified scouts only by default.
settings.faq_video_upload_answer: Go to your profile, tap 'Media', then 'Upload Video'. Select a video from your device (max 500MB). Videos are processed and compressed for optimal viewing. For users under 16, videos require approval before publishing.
settings.faq_scout_verification_answer: Scouts must submit verification documents including ID, club/academy affiliation, and credentials. Our team reviews all submissions within 2-3 business days. Verified scouts receive a badge on their profile.
settings.faq_contact_request_answer: Contact requests allow scouts to express interest in a player. Players receive notifications and can choose to accept or decline. If accepted, contact information is shared according to privacy settings.
settings.faq_parental_consent_answer: Users under 16 require parental consent to use ScoutMena. Parents receive an email with a secure link to approve their child's account. Parents can view and manage their child's account settings at any time.
settings.faq_delete_account: How do I delete my account?
settings.faq_delete_account_answer: Go to Settings > Account > Delete Account. Your data will be permanently deleted within 30 days. For users under 16, parents can also initiate account deletion.
settings.faq_privacy_security_answer: We use industry-standard encryption, secure servers, and strict access controls. Personal data is never sold to third parties. Read our Privacy Policy for complete details.
settings.faq_is_free_answer: Yes! Joining and creating a profile is free. Premium features are coming soon, but the core experience stays open to all.
settings.faq_need_academy: Do I need to be in an academy or club to join?
settings.faq_need_academy_answer: Not at all — ScoutMena welcomes players from academies, schools, clubs, and street football.
settings.faq_get_noticed_answer: By uploading skill videos, joining events, and earning rankings based on performance and engagement. It takes one video to get discovered.
settings.faq_coaches_search: Can coaches and scouts search for players?
settings.faq_coaches_search_answer: Yes — they can filter by age, gender, skill, region, and position, and invite players to trials or sessions.
settings.faq_video_types: What kind of videos should players upload?
settings.faq_video_types_answer: Short clips (10–30 seconds) showing skills like dribbling, passing, shooting, or match highlights. No fancy filming needed.
settings.faq_countries_answer: ScoutMena is live in Jordan, with expansion plans for Saudi Arabia, UAE, Qatar — and more across the MENA region.
settings.url_error: Error opening link. Please try again.
settings.request_my_data_desc: Download a copy of your personal data
settings.delete_account_desc: Permanently delete your account and data
settings.data_request_message: You can request a copy of all your personal data stored in ScoutMena. We will prepare and send it to your registered email within 7-10 business days.
settings.data_request_info: This includes your profile, photos, videos, messages, and activity history.
settings.delete_account_details:
Your account deletion request will be sent to our admin team for review. Once approved:

• Your profile will be permanently deleted
• All your photos and videos will be removed
• Your data cannot be recovered
• This process takes up to 30 days

For users under 16, parental consent is required.
settings.reason_hint: Help us improve by letting us know why you're leaving...
settings.delete_request_info: An admin will review your request within 24-48 hours.
settings.data_request_submitted: Data request submitted successfully! You will receive an email within 7-10 business days.
settings.delete_request_submitted: Account deletion request submitted successfully! Our team will review it within 24-48 hours.
settings.request_error: Failed to submit request. Please try again.
